g.H3068: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

g.H518: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
g.H3808: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
g.H8085: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
g.H413: near, with or among; often in general, to
g.H6942: to be (causatively, make, pronounce or observe as) clean (ceremonially or morally)
g.H853: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
g.H3117: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an a...
g.H1115: properly, a failure of, i.e. (used only as a negative particle, usually with a prepositional prefix) not, except, without, unless, besides, because...
g.H5375: to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
g.H4853: a burden; specifically, tribute, or (abstractly) porterage; figuratively, an utterance, chiefly adoom, especially singing; mental, desire
g.H935: to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
g.H8179: an opening, i.e. door or gate
g.H3389: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
g.H3341: to burn or set on fire; figuratively, to desolate
g.H3518: to expire or (causatively) to extinguish (fire, light, anger)
